multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the purpose of the Debiasing Variational Autoencoder (DB-VAE) algorithm?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To automatically identify and correct biases in latent features learned by a variational autoencoder
To generate new data points that are representative of the entire dataset
To reduce the dimensionality of the input data
To improve the accuracy of a classification model
